load.description: Loads the specified database from a .db file.

show.description: Prints the database entries with optional queries passed as single dash options and a query mode passed as a double dash option. The available flags are: in, eq, neq, gt, lt, geq, leq.

edel.description: Deletes the specified entry by passing its serial number.

emod.description: Edits the specified entry by passing its serial number and at least one field.

fadd.description: Adds a new field with a dedicated prompt.

fdel.description: Deletes the specified field by passing its serial name as a double dash option.

export.description: Exports the database to a .csv file into the data/ folder.
